column5: This beautiful spacious home is perfect for your Hill Country Getaway. Perfect for families with small children, or multiple couples vacationing together. Fenced-in back yard for pets. Only a few miles away from Schlitterbahn, Gruene, the Comal River, great restaurants, live music, bars. Come enjoy all that New Braunfels has to offer! 45 minute drive to Austin, 35 minute drive to San Antonio. The entire house will be yours with access to the neighborhood pool!
column8: Spacious 2-story Family Home close to everything!
